casebody.data:
Elizabeth BALL, Employee
v.
BAYADA HOME HEALTH CARE, Employer, Arch Insurance Group, Inc., Carrier (Gallagher Bassett Services, Inc., Third-Party Administrator) No. 161P19 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 14, 2019 Joy H. Brewer, Attorney at Law, for Bayada Home Health Care, et al. Thomas F. Ramer, Attorney at Law, Asheville, for Ball, Elizabeth.

ORDER

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 30th of April 2019 by Defendants for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Dissolved by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2019."

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendants on the 30th of April 2019 for Writ of Supersedeas of the judgment of the Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2019."

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 30th of April 2019 by Defendants in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2019."

Davis, J. recused
